item.title: Hard help... =[
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

can someone help me with this like where exactly do i put these things? for a 317…

dialog:
if(NPCID == Easter Bunny ID){
NpcDialogue = Dialoge ID;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}
}

Code: [Select]
case Dialoge ID:
c.talk("", “Would you like to help me and save easter?”, “”, 376);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.choice("", “What’s the problem.?”, “Maybe Later.”);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.talk2("", “The Rats and Goblens have teamed up against us. They stole our eggs. we need them back!”, “”, 376);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.talk3("", “Bring me back 10 eggs, Goodluck.”, “”, 376);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.playerTalk("", “Thanks!”, “”, “”);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
if(c.HasItemAmount(1961, 10)){
c.talk("", “Oh Thanks for the eggs, Here is a Easter Ring!”, “”, 376);
deleteItem(1961, 10);
addItem(7927, 1);
addItem(995, 100000);
break;

Npcdrops.cfg

Code: [Select]
//easterquest
npcdrop = 100 1961 1 100
npcdrop = 87 1961 1 100

Read full topic
